content.question: Hokusaiâ€™s Under the Wave off Kanagawa (Kanagawa oki nami ura) demonstrates the influence of European art on his work in its use of

choices.label: shading to suggest forms with volume, which recalls Italian Renaissance art
a composition with a low horizon line, which is indicative of Dutch painting
subject matter depicting everyday life, which was typical of Impressionism
hatching and crosshatching, which were employed in German printmaking

content.answer: a composition with a low horizon line, which is indicative of Dutch painting

unit.text: 8: South, East, and Southeast Asia, 300 BCE - 1980 CE

topic.text: 8.3: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in South, East, and Southeast Asian Art

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Explain the influence of a specific work of art (or group of related works of art) on other artistic production within or across cultures.
